about_the_game:
Welcome to SunnySide. This brief demo offers a one-shot experience limited to 10 in-game days, giving you a glimpse of what it will feel like to find harmony in the Japanese countryside. Please note, progress within this demo is not saved. Exiting the demo or returning to the main menu will reset your journey, but you are welcome to start over and explore as many times as you wish during the demo period.

This demo is an invitation to experience the charm of creating and nurturing your own space in a vibrant world. As you play, remember that every plant grown, every relationship fostered, and every corner explored is a step toward the grand adventure that awaits you in the full version of SunnySide.

Dive in, enjoy your time, and thank you for visiting SunnySide. We can't wait to welcome you back for the complete experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1070 / ATI Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® RTX 2060 / ATI Radeon RX 5600 XT

short_description: Explore SunnySide's demo, a one-shot experience limited to 10 in-game days in the serene Japanese countryside with this farming and life sim. You can replay this demo up to its limit as many times as you wish. Enjoy this glimpse into what SunnySide has to offer!
